ygData.subject: Shockwave & Unitron
ygData.msgSnippet: (If Hot Rod and Co. are in the Maximal City, ignore this post) Shockwave/Unitron: Shockwave and Unitron soared, engines at full power. Follow me. Shockwave

(If Hot Rod and Co. are in the Maximal City, ignore this post)

Shockwave/Unitron:



Shockwave and Unitron soared, engines at full power.

"Follow me." Shockwave sent via. comm. to the fuzors (Hedge) and Rainchark.

After a few cycles, they got a target lock.  Shockwave fired off a single 
missile at Hot Rod while Unitron fired off fifteen rapid laser blasts at the 
same Autobot hero.
